title: Days of the Week
description: A person talks about their weekly schedule
transcript: Let me tell you about my week. On Monday, I go to school. On Tuesday, I play football with my friends. On Wednesday, I have a piano lesson. On Thursday, I visit my grandmother. On Friday, I go to the cinema with my family. On Saturday, I sleep late and play games. On Sunday, I rest at home and read books. I like weekends the best!

questions.question: When does the person visit grandmother?
The person goes to cinema on Friday.
The person has a piano lesson on Monday.
